name: P08
prompt: Security camera footage from elevated doorbell camera, suburban home front porch at night. Single porch light provides harsh overhead illumination with deep shadows. A person in dark clothing carrying what appears to be a pry bar or tool. They walk steadily toward the front door from the edge of frame. Natural walking gait, arms swinging slightly. Fixed camera position, wide-angle lens with slight barrel distortion, fisheye edge distortion, IR-tinted footage quality typical of home security systems, slight grain. Realistic human motion, 15-second duration.
